item.title: Mesters\'eges Intelligencia Kutat\'asok Magyarorsz\'agon
item.description: arXiv:2503.05767v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) has undergone remarkable development since the mid-2000s, particularly in the fields of machine learning and deep learning, driven by the explosive growth of large databases and computational capacity. Hungarian researchers recognized the significance of AI early on, actively participating in international research and achieving significant results in both theoretical and practical domains. This article presents some key achievements in Hungarian AI research. It highlights the results from the period before the rise of deep learning (the early 2010s), then discusses major theoretical advancements in Hungary after 2010. Finally, it provides a brief overview of AI-related applied scientific achievements from 2010 onward.
item.dc:creator: Andr\'as A. Bencz\'ur, Tibor Gyim\'othy, Bal\'azs Szegedy
